title: Dirk Helbing - Wikipedia
snippet: Since June 2015 he was affiliate professor at the faculty of Technology, Policy and Management at TU Delft for some years, where he led the PhD school in "Engineering Social Technologies for a Responsible Digital Future". Dirk Helbing started out as a physicist.
